name: msc
description: Website for DCOG municipal form compliance.

scripts.dev: mkdir assets/bundles/images/; cp assets/images/* assets/bundles/images; parcel watch assets/css/msc.scss assets/js/msc.js --dist-dir assets/bundles
scripts.build: mkdir assets/bundles/images/; cp assets/images/* assets/bundles/images; parcel build assets/css/msc.scss assets/js/msc.js --dist-dir assets/bundles
